description: This file defines a class 'TagByControllerNameProcessor' implementing 'IOperationProcessor', used to set OpenAPI operation tags based on controller names in an ASP.NET Core project. It modifies the operation description tags by extracting the controller's class name, removing the 'Controller' suffix.

classes.name: TagByControllerNameProcessor
classes.description: Operation processor that sets OpenAPI operation tags based on controller class names to improve API documentation clarity.

methods.name: Process
methods.description: Sets the operation tag based on the controller's class name by removing the 'Controller' suffix if present.
